MAN.TITLE: seteventhandler
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: set an event handler for the current graphic window

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a character string. The name of the Scilab function which is intended to handle the events

DESCRIPTION.P: The function allows the user to set a particular event handler for the current graphic window. seteventhandler('') removes the handler.
For more information about event handler functions see the event handler functions help.
